meanings.definition: The act of putting a diaper on a baby.
meanings.sent1: After feeding, the caregiver began diapering the baby.
meanings.sent2: New parents quickly learn the importance of diapering their little ones.
meanings.sent3: The baby giggled during diapering time, finding it amusing.
meanings.sent4: In a world of baby care, diapering is like a superhero's cape.
meanings.sent5: The soft touch of the diapering process comforts the baby.

meanings.definition: The process of covering a surface with a diaper.
meanings.sent1: The caregiver completed the diapering of the changing table.
meanings.sent2: The diapering of the crib was necessary to protect it.
meanings.sent3: Covering the floor with diapers for fun was a unique diapering idea.
meanings.sent4: The diapering of the walls with colorful diapers transformed the room.
meanings.sent5: The meticulous diapering of every surface made the room baby-proof.

meanings.definition: The practice of using diapers for babies.
meanings.sent1: Diapering is a common practice in baby care routines.
meanings.sent2: Parents rely on diapering to keep their babies clean and dry.
meanings.sent3: The baby shower gift of diapering supplies brought smiles to the parents-to-be.
meanings.sent4: In the world of parenting, diapering is a daily essential.
meanings.sent5: The convenience of modern diapering products simplifies childcare.
